Increases the effect of applied elements.
Consume all elements on the target to gain a #yBlock that consumes stacks * 2.
Consumes all elemental stacks on the target, dealing damage as a stack and applying #y(1+ElementalMastery) stacks of elemental drain to all monsters.
Increases the damage of Elemental Reflexes by 0.5.
